title: Fuzzle
subtitle: How we designed and developed the Fuzzle app with meal planning and fitness tracking to improve weight management, helping users track their diet plan and health goals leading to improved well-being.

about.name: Fuzzle
about.desc: Fuzzle is an innovative, patent-pending weight management system designed to help users control hunger cues and improve their overall well-being.

projectTeam.desc: The team consisted of two UI designers and one UX designer along with the project owner. The entire project was completed in 2 months.
members: Project Management and UX Design - Vanshita

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Problem?
projectDetails_1.desc:
• Many individuals struggle with discipline when following diet plans, leading to inconsistent adherence. To address this, the fuzzle is implemented to physically restrict eating, serving as a control mechanism to enforce compliance.
  • In order to help the individuals with the problem the client needed an application that provides meal reminders and helps them to maintain and track their diet plan.

projectDetails_1.heading: What were the Goals?
projectDetails_1.desc:
• Design and develop an application that helps users plan their meals, manage their diet and track fitness metrics.
  • Enhance User Engagement: Provide features that make the app interactive and effective for its target audience.

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Solution?
projectDetails_1.desc:
Feature-Packed App

  • The app includes meal logging, customised meal plans, notifications, weight and glucose monitoring, community features, physical activity tracking, and streak management.


User-Friendly Design

  • The app features a minimal and user-friendly design, ensuring a seamless and straightforward journey to assist individuals effectively.

projectDetails_2.heading: Behind the Scenes...
projectDetails_2.desc:
Target Audience

  • Individuals aged 25-55, male and female, with sedentary and office going lifestyles in the US.
  • Individuals seeking tools for meal planning, fitness tracking, and weight management.


Market Analysis

We studied existing applications in the similar domain to understand the features and user flows that work best.



Developing User Flow

Based on the understanding we created a user flow and Implemented functionalities like meal planning, body metrics tracking, activity timers, and a chatbot to enhance the user experience.



Visualising The Features

We created multiple iterations on the design to refine the user flow and interface layout based on client feedback to ensure a seamless experience.



Problems Faced - Design

  • The initial lack of clarity around required features necessitated extensive exploration and brainstorming.
  • Designing and iterating on the app’s flow demanded significant effort to ensure ease of use and intuitive navigation.

projectDetails_3.heading: User Interface and Product Outlook
projectDetails_3.desc:
UI and Visuals

We adopted dark theme with purple accents a modern, brand-aligned aesthetic that resonates with the target audience.



Colors

We used purple as the primary color and accents of gray aligning with the client’s branding interests.



Typography

The font “Manrope” is used  for its modern appeal and “Chivo Mono” for the numerical data representation to ensure clear readibility.

projectDetails_4.heading: Conclusion
projectDetails_4.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?


  • Designed and developed the Fuzzle app with comprehensive features and a user-friendly design to tackle meal tracking and fitness management challenges.
  • Conducted thorough market analysis and used iterative design to ensure the app meets user needs.
  • Provided a comprehensive solution to help users improve their overall health.

projectDetails_4.heading: Client Feedback
projectDetails_4.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?


  • Re-designed the entire fuzzle app with a fresh outlook of minimalist and simpler user interface.
  • The new design improves usability and enhances fuzzle’s image as a reliable platform for connecting users with contractors and suppliers.
